txt.en: 'Miners from among the Men of Bree-land and beyond asked to learn the secrets of our mining. When they arrived they were ambitious and driven. Alas, not all are hewn from the earth and it seems the lack of sunlight has them confused and lethargic. They have become more nuisance than help.\n\n'Velgerd Kilnwarden stated she found a way to inspire them again. Perhaps, if you plan to assist us, she can advise you more.'
